data.title: Siemens Acquires Acuson
data.meta_description: On January 1, 2000, Siemens acquired medical products company Acuson
data.text: Siemens is a global engineering and electronics conglomerate company headquartered in Munich. Siemens serves a variety of customers and is organized in in four main divisions: Industry, Energy, Healthcare, and Infrastructure & Cities. Siemens was founded in 1847 and is based in Munich, Germany.
